name: Space Wesley! ( Mobile )
description:
Space Wesley is an #infinite #runner game where you must incorporate Wesley and escape the multiple projectiles by accumulating points and records in this #short #competitive game.

The game was made in celebration of two thousand views on the virtual comic book page in which Wesley is the protagonist, known as Breads On Fire.

#arcade #platformer #retro

Pixel-Art completely made by the incredible Starman!
